name: Dark eSportLiveScore Admin Panel by xmugi
additional_info:
Version 1.4.2
- Added support for more tabs
- Support for new panel coming soon

Version 1.4.1
- Fixed some bugs

Version 1.4
- Now support all tabs in Admin Panel (BETA)

Version 1.3
- Added support for trackdota
- Now works correct with new scorebot

Version 1.2
- Added support for scorebots
- Added support for mistake page
- Added support for doubles page
- Fixed login page

Version 1.1:
- Added support for Players
- Added support for ADD TEAM
- Added support for ADD TOURNAMENT

Version 1.0:
- eLS Dark Panel project started
- added dark theme
- fixed some bugs
